catList: This course’s aims to enhance the communication of graduate student research with the long term goal of facilitating research output. To this aim, the rhetorical genres characteristic of scientific/technical writing and presentation will be discussed: review of literature, poster, thesis, article for publication, conference abstract, and review paper. A final output of the course is the presentation of an exploratory research paper/poster within the student’s program field. Course materials and assignments are tied into ongoing projects in content course programs.
